channel.title: Open Source on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Software packages with more than 2 billion weekly downloads hit in supply-chain attack
item.description: Incident hitting npm users is likely the biggest supply-chain attack ever.

item.title: Microsoft open-sources Bill Gates’ 6502 BASIC from 1978
item.description: Historic interpreter taught millions to program on Commodore and Apple computers.

item.title: New AI model turns photos into explorable 3D worlds, with caveats
item.description: Openly available AI tool creates steerable 3D-like video, but requires serious GPU muscle.

item.title: Latam-GPT: The Free, Open Source, and Collaborative AI of Latin America
item.description: WIRED talks to the director of the Chilean National Center for Artificial Intelligence about Latam-GPT, the large-language model that aims to address the region’s specific needs and change the current

item.title: Latam-GPT: The Free, Open Source, and Collaborative AI of Latin America
item.description: WIRED talks to the director of the Chilean National Center for Artificial Intelligence about Latam-GPT, the large-language model that aims to address the region’s specific needs and change the current

item.title: College student’s “time travel” AI experiment accidentally outputs real 1834 history
item.description: Hobbyist training AI on Victorian texts gets an unexpected history lesson from his own creation.

item.title: A Special Diamond Is the Key to a Fully Open Source Quantum Sensor
item.description: Quantum sensors can be used in medical technologies, navigation systems, and more, but they’re too expensive for most people. That’s where the Uncut Gem open source project comes in.

item.title: A Special Diamond Is the Key to a Fully Open Source Quantum Sensor
item.description: Quantum sensors can be used in medical technologies, navigation systems, and more, but they’re too expensive for most people. That’s where the Uncut Gem open source project comes in.

item.title: OpenAI announces two “gpt-oss” open AI models, and you can download them today
item.description: OpenAI’s new open models can run on your hardware instead of in the cloud.

item.title: OpenAI Just Released Its First Open-Weight Models Since GPT-2
item.description: The models, gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b, represent a major shift for the AI company.

item.title: OpenAI Just Released Its First Open-Weight Models Since GPT-2
item.description: The models, gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b, represent a major shift for the AI company.

item.title: Blender developers begin work on full-fledged mobile version
item.description: Support will come to the iPad Pro first, with other platforms to follow.

item.title: Supply-chain attacks on open source software are getting out of hand
item.description: Attacks affected packages, including one with ~2.8 million weekly downloads.

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.
